content:
Just realized that we hadn't resolved whether to add an attribute or extension for Encounter Name. We have concerns about the ability to get this information from PlanDefinition and feel that Encounter is the right place. Thoughts?

https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=17519
Apologies, it appears I did post the question to Patient Administration, but haven't received any replies.
ooops lik this is meant for the #patient administration WG
